The Jumia Product Scraper is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to help users quickly gather essential product details from Jumia.com.ng, one of Africa's leading e-commerce platforms. Whether you're a business owner, data analyst, or researcher, this tool simplifies data collection, saving you time and effort.
